templates.template: MATCH (g:$GROUP_LABEL)<-[:$REL]-(n:$LABEL) WITH g, n RETURN g.$GROUP_PROP AS $GROUP_ALIAS, collect(n.$NODE_PROP)[0..1] AS $COLLECT_ALIAS
templates.anti_template: MATCH (g:$GROUP_LABEL), (n:$LABEL) WHERE NOT (g)<-[:$REL]-(n) WITH g, n RETURN g.$GROUP_PROP AS $GROUP_ALIAS, collect(n.$NODE_PROP)[0..1] AS $COLLECT_ALIAS

templates.template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1 {$PROP1: $VALUE}) MATCH (b:$LABEL2 {$PROP2: a.$REF_PROP}) WITH a, b ORDER BY b.$PROP_ID RETURN a, collect(b.$PROP_ID)[0..1] AS bs
templates.anti_template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1 {$PROP1: $VALUE}) MATCH (b:$LABEL2) WHERE b.$PROP2 <> a.$REF_PROP WITH a, b ORDER BY b.$PROP_ID RETURN a, collect(b.$PROP_ID)[0..1] AS bs

templates.template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1)-[:$REL1]->(b:$LABEL2)-[:$REL2]->(c:$LABEL3)-[:$REL3]->(d:$LABEL4) WITH a, d RETURN a, collect(d.$PROP)[0..1] AS ds
templates.anti_template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1), (d:$LABEL4) WHERE NOT (a)-[:$REL1]->(b:$LABEL2)-[:$REL2]->(c:$LABEL3)-[:$REL3]->(d) WITH a, d RETURN a, collect(d.$PROP)[0..1] AS ds

templates.template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1), (b:$LABEL2) WHERE a.$PROP1 = b.$PROP2 AND a <> b WITH a, b RETURN a, b
templates.anti_template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1), (b:$LABEL2) WHERE a.$PROP1 <> b.$PROP2 AND a <> b WITH a, b RETURN a, b

templates.template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1), (b:$LABEL2) WHERE a.$PROP1 = b.$PROP2 AND a <> b WITH a, b RETURN a, collect(b.$PROP)[0..1] AS bs
templates.anti_template: MATCH (a:$LABEL1), (b:$LABEL2) WHERE a.$PROP1 <> b.$PROP2 AND a <> b WITH a, b RETURN a, collect(b.$PROP)[0..1] AS bs
